is_arc59_opted_in.title: Is arc59 opted in
is_arc59_opted_in.description: If ARC59 not opted-in, clients should call ARC59 app with arc59_optRouterIn first. And then continue with arc59_sendAsset as always.

total_protocol_and_mbr_fee.title: Total protocol and mbr fee
total_protocol_and_mbr_fee.description: Total protocol and min balance fees including arc59 opt-in (if required in first parameter) + min_balance_requirement and all tx fees.

inbox_address.title: Inbox address
inbox_address.description: Inbox address of account. If null, there is no inbox account for this account.

algo_fund_amount.title: Algo fund amount
algo_fund_amount.description: Extra algo fund amount should be included.

warning_message.description: If there is any warning message, it should be included here.
